attributes.action: scarp all student debt in the united kingdom as banks have ruined our chances of jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that all student debt shoould be wrote of, or banks made to pay it as they have ruined the chances of us students getting jobs this summer. its beyond rediculous that they get all that money and the students the future of britain get into debt with little chance of a job, students should protest all over the country the old have ruined it for the young as usual

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
